BentoGrid.description: Asymmetrical grid for 'Highlights' section. Breaks the monotony of standard masonry.

MasonryGrid.description: Smart masonry for bulk photos. Staggered entrance animations.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. WRAPPER: Create a 'CinematicWrapper' component that wraps the PublicGallery content. This wrapper should handle the 'lenis' smooth scroll initialization.
2. HERO: Replace the existing static hero with a 'framer-motion' powered parallax hero. The title must be centered and huge.
3. HIGHLIGHTS: Replace the simple grid with a 'Bento' layout. Use the 'is_highlight' prop to filter these photos.
4. MASONRY: Enhance the existing masonry grid. Add more padding between items. Add a 'staggered fade-in' animation for each photo as it comes into view.
5. TYPOGRAPHY: Enforce the 'scale' defined in typography. Do not use default Tailwind sizes for headings.
6. NAVIGATION: Move the nav links/title into a floating glass pill. It should feel like an app, not a website.
7. THEME COMPATIBILITY: Use CSS variables (var(--theme-primary), etc.) for colors so the existing theme system still works, but apply the NEW layout structure regardless of the selected theme.
8. GUEST UPLOAD: Redesign the upload section to look like a 'Ticket' or 'Pass' rather than a form. Use a dashed border with a premium feel.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do not use generic centered layouts without intention.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
All interactive elements MUST include data-testid.
